item.title: SEARCH-WITH-ALGOLIA
item.author: Author
item.description: INTRODUCTION What makes Aloglia great? The goal of the JAMStack is eliminate server dependencies. Although Algolia is a bussiness solution, it offers a very generous free plan and performs up to 200 faster than open-source solutions like ElasticSearch. How Algolia works? Algolia provides a REST API to query and update your search indices. All input and output is provided in JSON, making it extremely easy to use in frontend Javascript.
